title: Team remade, I got 20min???
body: Just wondering, i just got a 20min and my team remaked, i got bugsplated and i was just restarting my comp, my friends didnt want me to get a ban so they thought to remake and i said ok, when i opened league i find that the games ended and i go ok so yeah we remaked, and when i get to the stat screen, it says ive been placed in lower priority que for 5 games and of coarse now i have a 20min, why would i get banned for afking 3 min???? I got bugsplated. Is this supposed to happen?

replies.body:
The Remake system penalizes whoever caused the remake, and in this instance, it sounds like that was you. Essentially what happens is if anyone in the match is marked as *inactive* for 90+ seconds within the first 3 minutes, it will prompt a remake. If that remake vote passes, when it becomes available at 3:00, the player who caused the remake will receive a loss penalty (if ranked) and can move them up the Leaverbuster penalty track.

In this situation, it looks like your bugsplat caused your inability to connect to the match, which triggered a Remake and due to a recent trend of disconnections on your account, you received a 5-game penalty. Regardless of intent, a disconnection negatively impacts *everyone in the match*. This is why all disconnections are treated equally and why we cannot remove or modify penalties.

I'd recommend working through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure your system drivers and hardware are in good standing, since these issues are often caused by those factors. If you still encounter bugsplats after through those steps, let me know.
